name: Joy Reyes-Madamba
text: Meron naman. We had a case na may nanalong bid na on paper lang yung tama ang specs kailangan namin pero pagdating nung equipment at nag-test kami hindi pala umaabot sa tamang spec (in our case frequency of operation). So pinabalik namin and na-ban for a certain period from submitting bids yung company
